message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $140 for it.
Bob, I understand your position. I'm willing to come down to $160, but that's the lowest I can go.  This product is truly worth more, and I'm sure you'll see the value in it.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate it. I would like to counter with an offer of $150 for the product.
